lead_paragraph: An article on May 24 about a recollection of a first night as a copy boy at The New York Times in 1959 misstated the output of Linotype machines he observed in the composing room. They punched out about six metal lines — not words — a minute.
snippet: An article on May 24 about a recollection of a first night as a copy boy at The New York Times in 1959 misstated the output of Linotype machines he observed in the composing room. They punched out about six metal lines — not words — a minute.
